message.entry: The parity-check matrix must be a sparse matrix.
The parity-check matrix must have at least one column.
The parity-check matrix must have more columns than rows.
The parity-check matrix must be a zero-one matrix.
The parity-check matrix must have at least one non-zero element in each column.
NumIterations must be a positive integer.
DecisionType must be either ''Hard decision'' or ''Soft decision''.
OutputFormat must be either ''Information part'' or ''Whole codeword''.
